scripts.clean:all: yarn clean && find services packages -type d -name node_modules -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find services packages -type f -name yarn.lock -exec rm -f '{}' + && find services packages -type f -name package-lock.json -exec rm -f '{}' +
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "gateway,auth,users,tokens,contacts,wallet" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,white" "yarn workspace api-gateway start:dev" "yarn workspace auth start:dev" "yarn workspace users start:dev" "yarn workspace tokens start:dev" "yarn workspace contacts start:dev" "yarn workspace wallet start:dev"
scripts.dev:core: concurrently -n "gateway,auth,users" -c "blue,green,yellow" "yarn workspace api-gateway start:dev" "yarn workspace auth start:dev" "yarn workspace users start:dev"
scripts.prisma:generate: yarn workspace users prisma:generate && yarn workspace contacts prisma:generate && yarn workspace wallet prisma:generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: yarn workspace users prisma:migrate && yarn workspace contacts prisma:migrate && yarn workspace wallet prisma:migrate
scripts.reset: yarn clean:all && yarn install && yarn build && yarn prisma:generate
